prompts.prompt:
Create a Component for an "e-learning" site with a list of courses.
Style it beautifully with Tailwind and Radix Themes elements. Connect it to the index page.
Add one long horizontal row per "course" that takes the length of the page.
Inside each row add one large thumbnail for the course.
Use stock images from the web as thumbnails for professional looking courses. 
Align the thumbnail to the left.
Next to the thumbnail add one smaller text for the category of the course.
Below that a Larger font with the Title
and Last the author of the course.
